name: Five Nights at The Rat Peoples
name_original: Five Nights at The Rat Peoples
description:
WARNING: This game is in BETA, and is in no way complete.

This is a Five Nights at Freddys fangame in which you play as a person trapped in a research lab located in a sewer filled with humanoid rat people. At day, you are helping the authorities locate you. But you're not playing at day. You are playing at night. As the night darkness sets in, the rat people start moving and looking for their next prey.

Note: this game is not meant to be scary, I made it in 3 days for a friend, and made all the sounds myself and the graphics are made in Minecraft.
